title: Smart Robot Assistant
description: Built a friendly interactive robotic companion capable of autonomously aiding children with disabilities with activities of daily living (ADL) and equipped with adaptive game playing capabilities.

title: Adaptive Chess Coach Robotic Arm
description: Built and programmed a robotic chess coach that replicates virtual chess moves into a real chess game. Provides real-time assistance and adjusts gameplay difficulty according to user needs.

title: FPGA Mandelbrot Set Accelerator
description: Designed and implemented an FPGA for hardware acceleration of the mathematical operations involved in computing the Mandelbrot set. This enabled a real time exploration of the Mandelbrot set, with x600 speed-up over a regular CPU implementation.

title: Database
description: Built a database filter to isolate search results using 12 search criteria from 800000+ items.

title: Web Scraper
description: Built an automated NLP tool that uses text embeddings to identify and scrape relevant Google search results based on user prompts.

title: Market Making Algorithm
description: Developed an algorithmic trading model that ranked 3rd place in the Optiver trading competition at Imperial College London, against 100 participants.
